mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GAMES WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 12 AND GSTATE = '1'

SELECT GCODE, GNAME, GSYSTEM, GPUBLISHER, GMAKER, TO_CHAR(GRELEASE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GRELEASE, GMAINIMG, GIMG, GVIDEO, GPRICE, GSALE, GDEADLINE, GTAG, GSTATE FROM GAMES WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND #{gameCount } AND GSTATE = '1'
SELECT DISTINCT GNAME FROM GAMES WHERE GNAME LIKE '%'||#{text}||'%'
SELECT DISTINCT GTAG FROM GAMES
SELECT NVL(COUNT(CNUMBER),0) FROM COUPONS WHERE CNUMBER = #{cnumber}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(CNUMBER),0) FROM COUPONS WHERE CNUMBER = #{code} AND CSTACK != 0 AND CREGIST = 'N'
SELECT NVL(MAX(CCODE),'C000000') FROM COUPONS
SELECT CTYPE FROM COUPONS WHERE CNUMBER = #{code} AND CREGIST = 'N'
SELECT CPERCENT FROM COUPONS WHERE CNUMBER = #{code} AND CREGIST = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE COUPONS SET CSTACK = CSTACK-1 WHERE CNUMBER = #{code} AND CREGIST = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COUPONS WHERE COWNER = #{uid}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(CCODE),0) FROM COUPONS WHERE CNUMBER = #{code} AND CREGIST = 'Y' AND COWNER = #{cowner} And CDEADLINE > SYSDATE
SELECT GCODE, GNAME, GSALE, GPRICE, GMAINIMG, GSALE, GTAG FROM GAMES WHERE LOWER(GNAME) LIKE LOWER(#{text}||'%')
SELECT GPRICE FROM GAMES WHERE GNAME = #{text}
SELECT MPOINT FROM MEMBERS WHERE MID = #{mid}
SELECT SUM(OPRICE) FROM ORDERS WHERE OMCODE = #{mid} AND OITEM = 'point'
SELECT NVL(SUM(OPRICE),0) FROM ORDERS WHERE OMCODE = #{mid} AND OITEM != 'point'
SELECT * FROM ORDERS WHERE OMCODE = #{mid} ORDER BY ODATE DESC
SELECT MNICKNAME FROM MEMBERS WHERE MID = #{mid}
SELECT NVL(MAX(RCODE), 'RC00000') FROM REVIEWS
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWS(RCODE, RGCODE, RMCODE, RDATE, RSCORE, RLIKE, RCONTENT, RSTATE) VALUES(#{review.rcode }, #{review.rgcode }, #{review.rmcode }, SYSDATE, #{review.rscore }, 0, #{review.rcontent }, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT RE.RCODE AS RCODE, TO_CHAR(RE.RDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS RDATE, RE.RSCORE AS RSCORE, RE.RLIKE AS RLIKE, RE.RCONTENT AS RCONTENT, MEM.MNICKNAME AS NICKNAME, MEM.MPROFILE AS PROFILE, MEM.MID AS MID FROM REVIEWS RE INNER JOIN MEMBERS MEM ON RE.RMCODE = MEM.MID WHERE RGCODE = #{gcode } ORDER BY RE.RDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWLIKES(RLRCODE, RLMID, RLSEL) VALUES(#{rcode }, #{memId }, #{selected })
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(SCODE), 'SC00000') FROM SHOPBASKET
